name: Sirecom Technologies
overview:
Our company offers a vast variety of Information Technology Services in the Miami Metro Area. We are capable of helping you resolve even the most complex problems on your network. We can help design, develop, install and maintain a computer based solution, from a single PC, to a Networked Server or Servers, with multiple workstations.

We are able to offer you unbiased advice, competitive pricing of industry standard hardware & software and prompt, friendly service. Support of existing or new systems can be tailored to your specific requirements and budget.

Our services IT software support aimed at providing cost effective, telephone based software support and advice and on-site support to the home-business user and small to medium sized businesses.

  • Hardware installation and support
  • Virus and spyware removal and protection
  • Security solutions
  • VPN (Virtual Private Networks)
  • Remote Access Solutions
  • Server installations and upgrades
  • Internet e-mail & messaging solutions
  • Internet connection
  • Web base e-mail access
  • Automatic System backups, onsite and offsite
  • Complete network management and support
